_header: Father of bliss omnipotent / For Thou hast made and create us
Subjects: carols, of the Trinity; Trinity, carols to
_description: James Ryman, ‘Te Deum laudamus’ — five quatrains (abab) including refrain (‘Te deum laudamus’) and burden: ‘Syng we alle thys tyme þus / Te deum laudamus’

CULEe112.First Lines:
ffadere of blisse omnipotentffor thou hast made and create
                    us…
CULEe112.Last Lines:
…Bothe iii and i of myghtis mostTe deum
                    laudamus
CULEe112.Note: Not signed by Ryman in MS.
CULEe112.Editions:
Zupitza,  Julius,
                        ed.  
             “Die Gedichte des Franziskaners Jacob Ryman.” 
             Archiv für das Studium der neueren Sprachen und
                Literaturen
         89 (1892): 167-338: 301.
Greene,  Richard Leighton. 
             The Early English Carols.
         Oxford: Clarendon, 1935; 2nd ed., rev., Oxford: Clarendon,
            1977: 204; 1977, 181.
